alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Hancock; Hendricks; Johnson; Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 12:17AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Hancock, northeastern Morgan, northwestern Johnson, southeastern Hendricks, Marion and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 1245 AM EST... At 1215 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mooresville, or 16 miles southwest of Indianapolis, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Southport around 1225 AM EST. Greenwood and Beech Grove around 1230 AM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Indianapolis, Lawrence and Greenfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 101 and 123. Interstate 69 between mile markers 200 and 213. Interstate 70 between mile markers 59 and 104. Interstate 74 between mile markers 69 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Hancock; Hendricks; Johnson; Marion; Morgan
